title: Fang Shu
text: Fang Shu is a mainland <a href="People%27s%20Republic%20of%20China">Chinese</a> film <a href="actress">actress</a>. For her performance in <a href="Sunrise">Sunrise</a>, Fang won <a href="Hundred%20Flowers%20Award%20for%20Best%20Actress">Hundred Flowers Award for Best Actress</a>, which adapted from <a href="Cao%20Yu%20%28playwright%29">Cao Yu</a>'s second play. Her most remembered role is "Xiao Luobotou" in "Eternity in Flames" (1964).
